    • Method Detail

      • getView

        public View getView(int position,
           View convertView,
           ViewGroup parent)
        This is called when the FontList activity is opened in order to populate the list. First it checks if the directory of each font exists - if it exists, it will display a checkmark indicator beside that font - if it does not exist, no checkmark will be displayed.
        Specified by:
        getView in interface Adapter
        Overrides:
        getView in class ArrayAdapter<String>

      • removeSpaces

        public static String removeSpaces(String line)
        This method removes spaces from strings and is used to construct download URL's from the original font names which usually have spaces in them. The URL must not contain spaces.
        Parameters:
        line - is the the input string that is to be processed
        Returns:
        The initial inputted string is returned as a new string containing no spaces
